creator: ankitc@ltp.soft.net
text:
When i ran nongui.bat -o TTR4.jmx(This file contains test plan which is 
successfully running in Gui mode) i got following error:

Got to here
Created the tree successfully
Error in NonGUIDrivernull
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.tree.NonGuiTree.addComponent(NonGuiTree.java:35
3)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.tree.NonGuiTree.addSubTree(NonGuiTree.java:267)

        at org.apache.jmeter.NonGuiDriver.run(NonGuiDriver.java:124)
        at org.apache.jmeter.NonGuiDriver.main(NonGuiDriver.java:100)

Befor running I added following lines in  nongui.bat:

set LOCALCLASSPATH=%CLASSPATH%

for %%i in ("..\lib\*.jar") do CALL ..\lcp.bat %%i
for %%i in ("..\ext\*.jar") do CALL ..\lcp.bat %%i

And I edited nongui.bat to change :

java -cp %CLASSPATH%;%CLSPATH% -D%LOG4JCONFIG% %HOST% %PORT% 
org.apache.jmeter.NonGuiDriver %PROP% %SRC%

To

java -cp %LOCALCLASSPATH%;%CLSPATH%;ApacheJMeter.jar -D%LOG4JCONFIG% %HOST% %
PORT% org.apache.jmeter.NonGuiDriver %PROP% %SRC%

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
Your "test plan" file needs to contain the Test Plan component at its root.  
When you save your test plan, right-click on the "Test Plan" tree node and save 
from there.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
